name: LeftVentricularAssistDevicePlacement
title: Left Ventricular Assist Device Placement
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts related to diagnoses associated with left ventricular assist devices.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent diagnoses related to left ventricular assist device.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Insertion of ventricular assist device; extracorporeal, biventricular
Replacement of extracorporeal ventricular assist device, single or biventricular, pump(s), single or each pump
Insertion of ventricular assist device, percutaneous, including radiological supervision and interpretation; left heart, arterial access only
Insertion of ventricular assist device, percutaneous, including radiological supervision and interpretation; left heart, both arterial and venous access, with transseptal puncture
Repositioning of percutaneous right or left heart ventricular assist device with imaging guidance at separate and distinct session from insertion

contains.display: Insertion of ventricular assist device; extracorporeal, biventricular
Replacement of extracorporeal ventricular assist device, single or biventricular, pump(s), single or each pump
Insertion of ventricular assist device, percutaneous, including radiological supervision and interpretation; left heart, arterial access only
Insertion of ventricular assist device, percutaneous, including radiological supervision and interpretation; left heart, both arterial and venous access, with transseptal puncture
Repositioning of percutaneous right or left heart ventricular assist device with imaging guidance at separate and distinct session from insertion
